title: #188: Differing Views - The Disappearance of Madeleine McCann
description:
Laura Richards and Jim Clemente discuss and share their opposing views and behavioural analysis about the disappearance of Madeleine McCann with Lisa Zambetti.

#TheDisappearanceOfMadeleineMcCann

If you have any information about Madeleine McCann in the UK:

NSY - Operation Grange:

(T): +44 (0) 207 321 9251

(E): Operation.grange@met.pnn.police.uk


The Polícia Judiciária in Portugal:

(T): +351 282 405 400

(E): Dic.portimao@pj.pt



If you would like to help Emma Shave raise money for victims of stalking and Paladin National Stalking Advocacy Service, please visit her Just Giving Page - every penny counts to help and reach more victims:

www.justgiving.com/fundraising/paintforpaladin
